name: Magic in the Woods
description:
*** Mind challenging puzzle game! ***

Are you the true genius who can solve all 60 puzzles? Initial levels are relatively easy, but the final ones are extremely hard.

Help Fred win Julia's heart! In order to impress Julia, Fred needs to help her with the riddle of the magical stones. Move and break stones and balloons. Merge the colorful stones. But beware of the monsters living in the forest!

You control Fred. Other characters (Julia, Gertruda, werewolves, stone eaters) have their own intelligence and you have to cooperate with them or work against them in order to solve the riddle.

Clever dynamics of stones and balloons. 60 mind challenging puzzles. So, are you the true genius who will solve them all?

Watch the trailer: http://youtu.be/6GsP-Am_WVg
